mapper.select: select data_version as dataVersion from static_risk_data group by data_version order by data_version desc limit 1

SELECT c.company_id as companyId, c.name as name, s.real_control_risk_v2 as real_control_risk_v2, s.illegal_financing_risk_v2 as illegal_financing_risk_v2 , s.short_risk_v2 as short_risk_v2, s.illegal_money_financing_risk_v2 as illegal_money_financing_risk_v2, s.person_structure_risk_v2 as person_structure_risk_v2 , s.relation_in_risk_v2 as relation_in_risk_v2 FROM company c, static_risk_data s where c.`name`=s.company_name and c.company_type=4 and s.data_version=#{newDataVersion}
SELECT count(1) FROM company_credit_raw_info WHERE company_id = #{companyID} and resource_name = #{resourceName}
